name: part_007
file: tmp_【#天音かなた卒業ライブ】「絶対的アイドル」 ⧸ Amane Kanata Graduation LIVE ＂THE ABSOLUTE IDOL＂【hololive】 [8iGGL_0CEpc]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_007.mov

scenes.description: Performance of 'Rolling Girl' by Amane Kanata.
Performance of 'Nobody Sees the Dream I See' by Amane Kanata.
scenes.song_name: Nobody Sees the Dream I See

subtitles.original: 色の、重なる声と声を
subtitles.english: ...colors, the voices that layer over each other,

subtitles.original: 混ぜあわせて、混ぜあわせて。
subtitles.english: Mix them together, mix them together.

subtitles.original: 「問題ない。」と呟いた言葉は、失われた。
subtitles.english: "No problem," she muttered, but the words were lost.

subtitles.original: どーなったっていいんだってさ、間違いだって起こしちゃおうとさ
subtitles.english: She says it doesn't matter what happens, let's just make a mistake

subtitles.original: 誘う坂道
subtitles.english: On this inviting slope...

subtitles.original: もう一回、もう一回。私をどうか転がして
subtitles.english: One more time, one more time. Please, keep me rolling

subtitles.original: と少女は言う、少女は言う。無口に意味を重ねながら
subtitles.english: So says the girl, so says the girl. Layering meaning into her silence

subtitles.original: もう一回、もう少し。もうすぐ何か見えるだろうと
subtitles.english: One more time, just a bit more. "I'll see something soon," she said

subtitles.original: 息を止めるの、今。
subtitles.english: I'll hold my breath, right now.

subtitles.original: もう一回、もう一回。私は今日も転がりますと
subtitles.english: One more time, one more time. "I'll keep rolling again today," she says

subtitles.original: と少女は言う、少女は言う。言葉に意味を奏でながら
subtitles.english: So says the girl, so says the girl. Playing with the meaning of her words

subtitles.original: 「もう良いかい？」 「もう少し、そろそろ君も疲れたろう、ね。」
subtitles.english: "Are you ready yet?" "Just a bit more, you're probably getting tired soon, right?"

subtitles.original: 息を止めるよ、今。
subtitles.english: I'll stop my breath, right now.

subtitles.original: 誰も見ていない夢を見ろ
subtitles.english: Nobody Sees the Dream I See

subtitles.original: 作詞・作曲：ビッケブランカ / 編曲：THE CHARM PARK
subtitles.english: Lyrics/Composition: Vicke Blanka / Arrangement: THE CHARM PARK

subtitles.original: 今度こそ生き返れない、そう思った
subtitles.english: I thought, "This time, I won't come back to life"

subtitles.original: ベッドの中、気付けばカーテンの隙間から
subtitles.english: In my bed, I noticed that through the gap in the curtains

subtitles.original: 朝が正解を教えた
subtitles.english: Morning told me the answer

subtitles.original: ああ、生きてたと安堵
subtitles.english: Ah, the relief of being alive

subtitles.original: ああ、生きてしまったと絶望
subtitles.english: Ah, the despair of having survived

subtitles.original: まだやれるのかな
subtitles.english: Can I still do this?

subtitles.original: まだやらなきゃなのかな
subtitles.english: Do I still have to keep going?

subtitles.original: いっそバリアーも変えてしまえば
subtitles.english: If only I could just change the barrier too

subtitles.original: なんてね
subtitles.english: Just kidding

subtitles.original: 「僕は元気です。」そう言って今日も笑って
subtitles.english: Saying, "I'm doing fine," and laughing again today

subtitles.original: 心はガラガラ大袈裟な音がする
subtitles.english: My heart makes a rattling, exaggerated sound

subtitles.original: 週末の鐘の音か
subtitles.english: Is that the sound of the weekend bell?

subtitles.original: それでもこの声が、それでもこの口が
subtitles.english: Even so, this voice... even so, this mouth...

subtitles.original: それでもこの喉が
subtitles.english: Even so, this throat...

subtitles.original: 千切れるくらい叫ぶよ
subtitles.english: Will scream until it tears

subtitles.original: この腕が、真っ白なこの羽が
subtitles.english: These arms... these pure white wings...

subtitles.original: 僕のこの命が
subtitles.english: This life of mine...

subtitles.original: 生きたいと歌ってる
subtitles.english: Is singing, "I want to live!"

subtitles.original: できるなら愛されたい、許されたい
subtitles.english: If I can, I want to be loved, I want to be forgiven

subtitles.original: ここにいたい、愛したい
subtitles.english: I want to be here, I want to love

subtitles.original: 誰も見ていない夢を見るよ
subtitles.english: I'll see the dream that nobody else sees

subtitles.original: だから僕を見ていろよ
subtitles.english: So keep your eyes on me!

subtitles.original: 感情の捨て方は、粗大ゴミのシールを貼る
subtitles.english: The way to throw away emotions is to stick a "bulky waste" sticker on them

subtitles.original: 本音はいつも強がりの裏
subtitles.english: My true feelings are always behind my bravado

subtitles.original: 潰れる音がするんだ
subtitles.english: I can hear the sound of them being crushed

subtitles.original: ああ、気付かれなかった
subtitles.english: Ah, nobody noticed

subtitles.original: ああ、気付いてほしいんだ
subtitles.english: Ah, I want you to notice

subtitles.original: それでも君が笑ってくれるなら
subtitles.english: Even so, if you will smile for me

subtitles.original: いっそ心を失くしてしまえば
subtitles.english: If only I could just lose my heart entirely

subtitles.original: なんてね
subtitles.english: Just kidding

subtitles.original: 「叶わない」なんて、一瞬でも思ったら負けだ
subtitles.english: "It won't come true" — if I think that for even a second, I've lost

subtitles.original: 「叶わない」なんて、一瞬でもよぎれば辞めだ
subtitles.english: "It won't come true" — if that even crosses my mind, I'll quit

subtitles.original: 何万通の諦める理由があったとしても
subtitles.english: Even if there were tens of thousands of reasons to give up

subtitles.original: たった一つの、勇気がこの手の中に
subtitles.english: I have just one piece of courage in my hands

subtitles.original: それでもこの声が、それでもこの口が
subtitles.english: Even so, this voice... even so, this mouth...

subtitles.original: それでもこの喉が
subtitles.english: Even so, this throat...

subtitles.original: 千切れるくらい叫ぶよ
subtitles.english: Will scream until it tears

subtitles.original: この腕が、真っ白なこの羽が
subtitles.english: These arms... these pure white wings...

subtitles.original: 僕のこの命が
subtitles.english: This life of mine...

subtitles.original: 生きたいと歌ってる
subtitles.english: Is singing, "I want to live!"

subtitles.original: できるなら愛されたい、許されたい
subtitles.english: If I can, I want to be loved, I want to be forgiven

subtitles.original: ここにいたい、愛したい
subtitles.english: I want to be here, I want to love

subtitles.original: 誰も見ていない夢を見るよ
subtitles.english: I'll see the dream that nobody else sees

subtitles.original: だから僕を...
subtitles.english: So, look at me...
